meanings.definition: A type of magnet made from aluminum, nickel, and cobalt.
meanings.sent1: The alnico magnet stuck to the fridge.
meanings.sent2: I used an alnico magnet to pick up the metal screws.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted the alnico magnet around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an alnico magnet, drawing everyone closer.
meanings.sent5: The alnico magnet hummed with energy as it attracted the paperclips.

meanings.definition: An alloy consisting of aluminum, nickel, and cobalt.
meanings.sent1: The alnico alloy was used in the construction of the new engine.
meanings.sent2: The alnico alloy had a shiny appearance.
meanings.sent3: The chef experimented with adding alnico alloy to the recipe.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as strong as an alnico alloy, unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The alnico alloy gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting its components.
